articles.title: Luffy's childhood
articles.content: Luffy has two brothers, Ace and Sabo.

articles.title: Monkey D Luffy
articles.content: Monkey D Luffe, who ate the devil fruit, is a rubber man.

articles.title: Luffy and Sabo
articles.content: Luffy fight with Sabo. Sabo ate the shaoshao devil fruite which belonged to Ace before.
